name: The Lost Shroom
description:
The Lost Shroom is a platformer where the main character walks indefinitely, until he hits a wall, which will make him turn around, which makes for a very reaction-time based game.



     My first game ever     

   Controls                           

[Space] to Jump
[Left-Click] to shoot

 Cheats

[N] to skip to the next level
[M] to go back to the previous level

- By Filipe Ribeiro

- Developed in Processing
